question: What is the drug Tecfidera used against?
ideal_answer: Tecifidera is approved for the treatment of relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis.

snippets.text: Dimethyl fumarate (Tecfidera™) is an effective therapy for relapsing forms of multiple sclerosis (MS).
Tecifidera is approved for the treatment of relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis
Dimethyl fumarate (Tecfidera): a new oral agent for multiple sclerosis.

exact_answer: Tecifidera is approved for the treatment of relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis
